description:
From our office in Media, Pennsylvania, Bellwoar Kelly, LLP, is a trusted resource with a strong reputation in matters of criminal defense, personal injury, immigration law, divorce, business law, real estate, and municipal law.

Comprehensive Criminal Defense Services

Our attorneys are former prosecutors with extensive, well-rounded experience in criminal courts. We have successfully defended clients in a full range of criminal law matters, including:

  • Drug crimes like possession, paraphernalia offenses and intent to deliver drugs.
  • DUI charges that can have life-altering repercussions
  • Sex offenses that can carry harsh penalties and a lasting social stigma
  • Theft crimes, including robbery, burglary, embezzlement and other white collar crimes
  • Charges brought against juveniles and college students
  • Post-conviction issues, including appeals, probation violations and expungement of records

Compassionate Personal Injury Representation

A serious accident or injury can have lifelong implications on your physical, financial and emotional well-being. If you or a loved one was hurt because of someone else's negligence, you may be entitled to compensation for your medical expenses, lost wages, pain and suffering, loss of life, or other damages. We are tenacious, compassionate advocates for injury victims throughout Delaware County and the surrounding communities in Pennsylvania.

Available 24/7 - Free Consultation
